Package surface

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bounce
    A surface for which upon collision with will immediately re-orient the intertial vector or cause it to "bounce off"
    Exit
    A surface for which upon collision with will immediately complete the level.
    FaithPlate
    A surface for which upon collision with (standing on top of) will immediately catapult the user in a specified direction
    Killer
    The default surface that portals cannot be created onto
    Piece
    The default surface that portals can be created onto
    PKiller
    The default surface that kills the player, it also does not allow portals to be created on it
    Platform
    A class which will handle all movements of any surface.
    Surface  
    Win  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Orientation
    The orientation of a surface, used to speedily calculate the euleran angles of rotation
